Windlord:

Windlord expected that the energon sugar would help him to calm down 
the little one, when he saw Aerotaur arrived to observation windows. 
he looking to Cam said "I'll be back little one... "

Windlord sat down and opened the intercom "Hi aerotaur, it's a laege 
story..."

And he started to told him how the computers detected the pod an he 
went to investigate.

"It seems that the little one was sent out from transformer's planet 
before she get sick of a epidemy that was killing bots there"said 
the male while he lowed the voice wishin that the little one didn't 
hear him "It just protocol, just for your safely. Perhaps Wheeljack 
or Kup have to find out what sort of sickness was and how long we 
have to be here..."

> Cam::
> She started to fuss and whine. "I want sweet energon."  and cries. 
> tears go rolling down her cheeks. 
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He finally stands up and walks over to a computer and 
downloads a map 
> of the base.  With that handy he walks to the quarantine bays to 
see his 
> friend.  Upon his arrival he wanders around until he finds the 
observation 
> window and intercom.  "Hey Windlord, I see they've got you baby-
sitting.  
> Who've you got there?"
<raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Camoflage::
> 
> She whined and started to cry. "because I don't like it. I want 
sweet 
> energon."  as she cried, tears ran down her little cheeks. "I WANT 
> SWEET ENERGON! WAHHHHHHHHH!"
